display: Fuel Delivery and Air Induction >> Mechanical (Specifications) >> Tightening Specifications
title: Tightening Specifications
content:
Fuel filter retaining strap bolt .................... 106 in-lbs (12 Nm)
    Fuel injector hold down clamps .................... 95 in-lbs (11 Nm)
    Fuel tank strap nuts .................... 65 in-lbs (7.3 Nm)
    Fuel tank skid plate nuts .................... 12 ft-lbs (16 Nm)
    Fuel pump mounting screws .................... 18 in-lbs (2 Nm)
    Fuel presure regulator .................... 60 in-lbs (7 Nm)
    Idle air control motor .................... 17 in-lbs (2 Nm)
    Throttle body mounting nuts .................... 9 ft-lbs (12 Nm)
    Battery terminals .................... 75 in-lbs (8.5 Nm)
